text: mun tinam avanutaiya (celva) nilaiyai virumpiyavarkalellam, "accariyam tan! Allah tan atiyarkalil, tan natiyavarkalukku akara vacatikalaip perukkukiran, curukkiyum vitukiran; allah namakku kirupai ceyyavillaiyayin avan nam'maiyum (pumiyil) aluntac ceytiruppan; accariyam tan! Niccayamaka kahpirkal cittiyataiya mattarkal" enru kurinarkal
